sen.j: 朽木 舖綱（くつき のぶつな）は、丹波国福知山藩の第7代藩主。
sen.e: Nobutsuna KUTSUKI was the seventh lord of Fukuchiyama domain in Tanba Province.

sen.j: 享保15年（1730年）11月24日、第5代藩主・朽木玄綱の長男として生まれる。
sen.e: Born on November 24, 1730 as the first son of Totsuna KUTSUKI, the fifth lord of the domain.

sen.j: 本来なら父・玄綱の後を継いで第6代藩主となるはずだった。
sen.e: He was supposed to become the sixth lord of the domain after his father Totsuna.
He was supposed to become the sixth lord of the Domain after his father Totsuna.

sen.j: しかし、朽木一族の朽木綱貞が家臣団から第6代藩主として擁立されたため、舖綱は綱貞の養子となった。
sen.e: However, Tsunasada KUTSUKI of the Kutsuki family was backed up to become the sixth lord by the vassals, and Nobutsuna was adopted by Tsunasada.

sen.j: 安永9年（1780年）8月22日に綱貞が隠居すると、家督を継いで第7代藩主となった。
sen.e: When Tsunasada retired on August 22, 1780, he took over as head of the family and became the seventh lord of the domain.

sen.j: 舖綱は『擬独語』を著わし、藩校創設の基礎を築き上げるなど、藩政を立て直すために積極的な藩政改革を目指した。
sen.e: He actively worked on the reformation of domain duties to recover the administration of the domain by writing "Gidokugo" (an essay by Nobutsuna KUTSUKI) and establishing the base for the foundation of domain school.

sen.e: He actively worked on the reformation of domain duties to recover the administration of the Domain by writing "Gidokugo" (an essay by Nobutsuna KUTSUKI) and establishing the base for the foundation of domain school.

sen.j: しかし、在位7年後の天明7年（1787年）2月22日に隠居して家督を養子の朽木昌綱に譲り、直後の9月19日に福知山で死去したため、十分な成果を挙げることはなかった。
sen.e: However, he retired on February 22, 1787 after seven years of reign, and let his adopted son Masatsuna KUTSUKI to succeed and died on September 19, which was soon after his retirement; therefore, he could not accomplish much.
